data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/420530/extras/logo.png?t=1727717489[/img]

A surreal puzzle adventure game with unique mechanics [b][i][u]/[/u][/i][/b] capabilitie[b][i]s[/i][/b].

You are t[b][i]o[/i][/b] guide a child through a mysterious world on a mission to restore its [b][i]l[/i][/b]ong-dead sun.

...Of cour[b][i]s[/i][/b]e, things are never tha[b][i]t[/i][/b] simple.

The world knows you ex[b][i]i[/i][/b]st.

The [b][i]c[/i][/b]onsequences are real.

Saving the world may b[b][i]e[/i][/b] impossible.

You only have one shot.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/420530/extras/img1.png?t=1727717489[/img]

[h2]FEATURES[/h2]
[list]
[*]Gameplay mechanics that go beyond the game window. 
[*]A haunting original soundtrack and artwork designed to match.
[*]A unique relationship between a game and its player.
[*]A lingering feeling that you're not getting the full story unless you know where to look.
[/list]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/420530/extras/img2.png?t=1727717489[/img]

[h2]CONTENT WARNING[/h2]
Although OneShot is not a horror game in the traditional sense, parts of the game may induce some paranoia. Please proceed with caution.

[h2]CLOSING THE GAME WINDOW[/h2]
Do not worry, it is safe to do so. It only saves your progress.
data.strSnippet: OneShot is a surreal top down Puzzle/Adventure game with unique gameplay capabilities. You are to guide a child through a mysterious world on a mission to restore its long-dead sun. The world knows you exist.
